pullRequest.title: PLFM-6012 STS Sample Code
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://sagebionetworks.jira.com/browse/PLFM-6012
I put the sample code in our Synapse-Repository-Services, to make it easier to share with others.
I also made an integration test for our sample code to ensure that it works and that it will continue to work as we make changes in the future.

nodes.bodyText: Try prefix includes the trailing delimiter, so we don't need that weird if statement.
Only the storage location owner can import files from S3.
Inline the constant for readability for sample code.
The version should be in the root pom.xml under dependencyManagement.
Make a comment in the sample code that we migrate owner.txt. You can add a check to prevent this.
